attributes.description:
VOLKSWAGEN GOLF V11 1.0 TSI COMFORTLINE
Beautiful VW Golf in fantastic condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Electric windows and mirrors. Manual transmission and gives a smooth, comfortable drive to all your destinations. Great fuel consumption. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this Comfortline for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

Mercedes-benz C Class (2014) C180 Amg Line a/t
Stunning Mercedes Benz C180 in excellent condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Electric windows and mirrors. Automatic transmission that allows for a smooth, easy drive. Height adjustable seats with average fuel computer. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this beauty for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.
